resources.string: Hotel Silver is a luxurious family hotel located near soccer stadium Gradski Vrt, sport hall, indoor pools and shopping centre. It is only 2.000 meters away from the city centre.Whether you are on tourist or business visit, we will make your stay in Osijek pleasant and carefree. Use a unique opportunity to discover the gastronomic specialties of our region in rich and exceptional offer of Silver Restaurant, and enjoy selected wines from Slavonian vineyards.Hotel Silver will be your favourite place for relaxation and spending a pleasant time, business successes and unforgettable moments."

Pleasant surroundings of our modern and elegantly decorated rooms are guarantee for quality rest, which we all need for new challenges and daily duties. Special benefits like free access to broadband Internet, air condition in all rooms, available parking spaces for guests, make Hotel Silver a perfect choice for business people, but also for travellers who enjoy the sights of our city and region.Rooms are available with French bed and separate beds. Our Rooms also have: Mini bar,free internet,telephone in room and bathroom,air condition,hair dryer in bathroom,TV with satellite channels and safe
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
